title: [COMPLETE] Server Maintanance: 28th November @ 00:30 AEDT
body:
Hi all

We'll be performing some scheduled maintenance and as a result the OCE League of Legends servers will be offline for a few hours.  During this time you won't be able to log in and play.

Here's what you need to know:

* Ranked queues will go offline in preparation for the server shutdown.  This will happen just after midnight on the 28th November (from 00:30 AEDT... aka 12:30am).
* At 02:00 AEDT, all games will terminate and the LoL servers will be taken offline for maintenance.
* We expect the servers to be offline for up to 4 hours.
* When the servers come back online, Ranked Queues will be disabled for approximately 1 hour while we perform additional tasks.
* You can keep up to date on the [Service Status page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce)

Cheers
Mindstar
